title: Pessat question
content: Sorry to ask sm about pessat... In the pes website it says pessat will be based on class 11  nd 12 cbse questions...does tht mean solving ncert would be sufficient to get a good rank.....will the questions be directly or with small changes frm ncert or will the questions be harder to solve? Thanks in advance

comments.body:
Hi, 
NCERT is the base of what they'll test you on, but it's not close to enough. I guess JEE Mains would be the level you should prepare on. 
All the best!
Your JEE/CET prep would be more than enough. Doubtful that NCERT would suffice
Mains stuff will do, but pessat is based on luck aswell because of relative ranking, your rank will mainly depend on how well others have done on the day you gave the exam.
